nodes.text: A Jungle battle droid served the Sith apprentice Asajj Ventress during the Clone Wars. The battle droid was under the command of 224 in the battle on Rugosa. He was destroyed alongside the rest of the droid forces deployed to the area by Jedi Grand Master Yoda.

The droid appeared in "Ambush", the first episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on October 3, 2008. As a battle droid, he was voiced by Matthew Wood.
